scripts.spectrum-convert: node bin/css2js.js '**/*.css' './node_modules/@adobe/spectrum-css/dist/components' './spectrum' && node bin/css2js.js '*.css' './node_modules/@adobe/spectrum-css/dist/vars' './spectrum/vars' && node bin/css2js.js '*.css' './node_modules/@adobe/spectrum-css/dist' './spectrum'
